inclusion.criterion: otherwise normal healthy adults aged 18 to 65
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Known history of liver, kidney or hematological disease (other than G6PD deficiency)
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Known history of cardiac disease, non-sinus rhythm arrhythmia or QT prolongation
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Subject is pregnant or breast-feeding, or is expecting to conceive during the study.
exclusion.label: met

notes: 16-year-old girl with myasthenia gravis, class IIa. Positive anti-AChR antibody test and SFEMG. On acetylcholinesterase inhibitor treatment combined with immunosuppressants.
